description: creates a PR to the repository property defined in the package.json to release a latest-rc build

flags.rctag: the tag name that corresponds to the npm RC build, usually latest-rc or stable-rc
flags.resolutions: bump the versions of packages listed in the resolutions section
flags.pinnedDeps: bump the versions of the packages listed in the pinnedDependencies section
flags.patch: bump the release as a patch of an existing version, not a new minor version
flags.buildOnly: only build the latest rc, do not git add/commit/push
